{"useful_question":"2","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"The speakers were talking about receiving feedback from managers. The captions were not clear - at times, it stated who was speaking and then it became inconsistent."}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"The little boy who is an actor in the movie, Sheldon was talking about his experience working with his coach, Jim on the Ellen Show. {"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"The female speakers were discussing how the business world is still discriminatory against hiring women. The captions were easy on the eyes - I did not see any issues. "}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"Mandy was being interviewed about how being in an abusive relationship had impacted her career as a musician. {"useful_question":"2","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"It was of a panel discussing El Nino. The captions were annoying - I did not like the different colors - I would much rather for the captions to separate speakers by names instead."}

{"useful_question":"2","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"Actors from Good Boys Gone Bad television show was being interviewed by Jimmel. The captions were unpleasant to follow with the emojis and I had to rely on visual cues to see who was speaking."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"The panel was discussing the term, \"addiction\" and whether it was appropriate to describe the tendency to text while driving. The captions were accurate and easily followed regarding who was speaking."}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"The panel discussed the idea of doing homework with your children. The captions were accurate but I would have liked for the sentences to be separated when a different speaker is speaking."}
